about.summary: nose plugin for coverage reporting, including subprocesses and multiprocessing

name: nose-cov
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.6" %}

package:
  name: nose-cov
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: nose-cov-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/n/nose-cov/nose-cov-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8bec0335598f1cc69e3262cc50d7678c1a6010fa44625ce343c4ec1500774412

build:
  number: 0
  script: pip install --no-deps .
  preserve_egg_dir: True

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - nose >=0.11.4
    - cov-core >=1.6

test:
  requires:
    - nose
  commands:
    - nosetests --with-cov  # [win]

about:
  home: http://bitbucket.org/memedough/nose-cov/overview
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'nose plugin for coverage reporting, including subprocesses and multiprocessing'
  license_family: MIT

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bollwyvl
    - ocefpaf

about.summary: nose plugin for coverage reporting, including subprocesses and multiprocessing
